trans-unit.source: Represents an exception that is thrown when an error occurred while reading, querying, or subscribing to the events in an event log.
trans-unit.target: 表示在读取、查询或订阅事件日志中的事件的过程中发生错误时引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception can be caused by an invalid event query.
trans-unit.target: 由无效的事件查询可能会引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: For example code using this class, see [How to: Subscribe to Events in an Event Log](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/62e006d3-9fab-4fdf-a8f8-e23d05498cd4).
trans-unit.target: 有关示例代码使用此类，请参阅[如何： 订阅事件日志中的事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/62e006d3-9fab-4fdf-a8f8-e23d05498cd4)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogReadingException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogReadingException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogReadingException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogReadingException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The error message that describes the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 描述当前异常的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogReadingException" /> class by specifying the error message that describes the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 通过指定描述当前异常的错误消息初始化 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogReadingException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object that holds the serialized object data about the exception thrown.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 对象，它包含有关所引发异常的序列化对象数据。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> object that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> 对象，它包含有关源或目标的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogReadingException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 用序列化数据初始化 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogReadingException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The error message that describes the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 描述当前异常的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The Exception instance that caused the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogReadingException" /> class with an error message and inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用错误消息和内部异常初始化 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogReadingException" /> 类的新实例。
